name: Google Calendar
description: Manage Google Calendar events, check availability, and schedule meetings. List calendars, create/update/delete events, and check free/busy status.

inputs.label: OAuth Credentials Path
inputs.description: Path to your Google OAuth credentials JSON file (Desktop app type).

obtain.instructions:
1. Create a Google Cloud project
2. Enable the Google Calendar API
3. Create OAuth 2.0 credentials (Desktop app type)
4. Download the JSON key file
5. Run 'npx @cocal/google-calendar-mcp auth' to authenticate

auth.instructions: Set up OAuth 2.0 credentials from Google Cloud Console with Calendar scope. Run 'npx @cocal/google-calendar-mcp auth' for first-time setup.
